"Xiera":
"<%me>, happy Halloween!
It's Xiera! One moment please..."
"As it happens, the Phantom apparition that takes the form of Matoi seems to have reappeared in the Shop Area."

"Besides that! There seems to be...
A Phantom duplicate of me! Of course, it isn't me!"
"Neither Phantom is giving off an enemy reading, so they must have been embodied by someone through Ether..."
"I want to collect some more data for now, so could you keep an eye on the situation?"
